import React, { Component } from "react" import {Button, Grid, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap" import BarChart from './BarChart.js' import Doughnut from './DoughnutChart.js' export default class CategoryBarChart extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state={ bar: true } } handleToggle = () => { this.setState({ bar: !this.state.bar }) } dataObject = () => ( { labels: this.props.categoryLabels, datasets: [{ label: 'Money Spent', data: this.props.categoryTotals, backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(230, 25, 75, .4)', 'rgba(245, 130, 48, .4)', 'rgba(255, 225, 25, .4)', 'rgba(210, 245, 60, .4)', 'rgba(60, 180, 75, .4)', 'rgba(70, 240, 240, .4)', 'rgba(0, 130, 200, .4)', 'rgba(145, 30, 180, .4)', 'rgba(240, 50, 230, .4)', 'rgba(128, 128, 128, .4)' ], borderColor: [ 'red', 'orange', 'yellow', 'lime', 'green', 'cyan', 'blue', 'purple', 'magenta', 'grey' ], borderWidth: 1 }] } ) render() { return (
{this.state.bar ? : } {this.state.bar ? : }


) } }
